headline: IntelliTrans Recognized as a Top 100 Logistics & Supply Chain Technology Provider for 2025
summary: Winners Provide a Range of Solutions, Including TMS and WMS, to Niche OfferingsATLANTA, May 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IntelliTrans, a leader in software and services for transportation management in bulk and break-bulk shipping, announces its inclusion in the Inbound Logistics Top 100 Logistics & Supply Chain Technology Providers for 2025. This honor reinforces IntelliTrans’ continued commitment to innovation and excellence in addressing the evolving challenges of modern supply chains. Select
